channel.title: variables on Notes
channel.description: Recent content in variables on Notes

item.title: About variables in ruby
item.description: # Local v = "Ruby" # => "Ruby" v.class # => String v.kind_of? String # => true defined? v # => "local-variable" # Instance @i = "Ruby" # => "Ruby" defined? @i # => "instance-variable" # Global $g = "Ruby" # => "Ruby" defined? $g # => "global-variable" # Constant C = "Ruby" # => "Ruby" defined? C # => "constant"
